attributes.action: refuse the USA permission to base thier anti ballistic (son of star wars) weapons on British Soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The risk of attack by ballistic or nuclear weapon is almost non- existant, and it is not Britains responsibility to act with the USA to form a Global Police.
By basing these weapons on British soil it will increase the risk of terrorist attacks on our citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
